data.title: Sunny South Bluegrass Band
data.meta_description: Home page of Sunny South Bluegrass Band, an americana, bluegrass, folk, traditional group from Portland. Sunny South is a bluegrass group in Portland, Oregon that specializes in a rich tradition of music.
data.text:
Hey friends,

Sunny South is staying busy, check our calendar for our current shows. We are excited to be playing at Columbia Gorge Bluegrass Festival at the end of July. If you have a festival you'd like to see us at, please let us know. It's that time of year where we start sending in our information to play at festivals next summer. We would love to play some more festivals in our area.

We are getting ready to go in to the studio and record. We should have CD's and downloadable music available before too long. We will be sure to let you all know when it is ready.

Hope you are all well and enjoying the summer.

Sincerely,

Sunny South

Hey there,

We have so many new shows booked for 2024, it's going to be a blast. Please check our shows page to see where we are playing. You can also follow us on Facebook where we regularly post shows. https://www.facebook.com/sunnysouthbluegrass

An exciting development for us is a regular show at Haymaker Eatery and at the Muddy Rudder.

We will be at Haymaker the first Wednesday of the month for March, April and May. https://www.haymakerportland.com/

We will at Muddy Rudder on the fourth Thursday of the month for March, April and May as well. https://muddyrudderpdx.com/

We hope to continue these regular shows. If you can support us by coming to a show or two that would be really helpful to our continued appearance at these locations. Thank you for supporting us and local bluegrass music in the Portland area.

Hey friends,

2024 is looking to be a busy year. We have several shows coming up and will update our events page ASAP. Please check our calendar for show times. Hopefully, we can see you and play for you in 2024. Also please follow us on Facebook to keep track of us. https://www.facebook.com/sunnysouthbluegrass/

Happy new year and see you soon!

Sunny South

Hello friends,

We're thrilled to share that Sunny South has an exciting summer ahead, and we'd love for you to be a part of it. In July, we have the absolute pleasure of performing at a wedding—an occasion we always find incredibly uplifting. Additionally, we're eagerly looking forward to our show at an elderly care facility, where we find immense joy in connecting with the residents. Following that, we're heading to Darrington, Washington to be a part of the fantastic festival there, and then off to Stevenson, Washington to perform at the renowned Columbia Gorge Bluegrass Festival! August kicks off with a spirited performance at Bluegrass in the Orchardgrass. Rest assured, we're diligently updating our website and social media platforms with these upcoming dates.

During our shows, we'll have our signature t-shirts and stickers available for purchase. If you'd like to get your hands on one, simply let us know—we'd be more than happy to make it happen.

Furthermore, we have plans to hit the studio towards the end of the summer or early fall, with the aim of capturing our music in a recording. We'll be sure to keep you updated on our progress as we move forward.

We genuinely appreciate your support and can't wait to share these memorable moments with you. Stay tuned for more exciting news and updates!

Warmest regards,

Sunny South Bluegrass

Hey friends,

Well it's starting to feel like summer is coming to an end as our days get shorter and the nights are cooler. We had a great summer and enjoyed playing out. A couple of highlights for us were playing at the Columbia Gorge Bluegrass Festival and Winlock Pickersfest. It's the time of year where we start looking at booking shows for the winter, spring and next summer. We are excited to work on new material during this time as well and do some wood shedding.

Our next show will be in October out at the Multnomah Grange Hall. It is posted on our calendar so stop over there to check it out. At our next show we will be selling t-shirts and stickers. We hope to see you soon, take care!

Summer is flying by. We have had several fun shows this summer including at the Troutdale First Friday and at the Hollywood Farmers Market. We are really excited to be kicking off the shows at the Columbia Gorge Bluegrass Festival in Stevenson, Washington http://new.columbiagorgebluegrass.net/.

And after that we will be at Winlock Picker's Fest. https://winlockpickersfest.com/

Check out our calendar for all the details. We hope to see you at one of these events.

Sincerely,

Sunny South

Howdy Friends,

We have been busy over here at the Sunny South corporate headquarters... Busy digitizing more great music to share. This time we have the first Sunny South recording done in 1980. This was digitized from it's original format cassette. There's some great playing and we hope you enjoy. Go ahead and check it out on our music page.

We added a couple more shows to the calendar so please check that out as well and we look forward to seeing you all soon.

Sincerely,

Sunny South
